description: Released Julie v1.14.0 - TOON Format Integration. Major release featuring 35-70% token savings via TOON format across all major tools, default limits reduced to 10 for 80% efficiency, data structure optimization (39% additional reduction), Gemini review improvements, and toon-format v0.3.7 with round-trip capability. All 1,846 tests passing, release build successful. Commit 73b7512 tagged and pushed to main.
